headline.main: BRITISH WELCOME AFRICAN VICTORY; They Expect to Drive Ahead to Oust the Italians From All Eastern Colonies WAVELL HOLDS INITIATIVE

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Feb. 1 -- The important thing about the Middle East campaign from the British point of view is the way Britain has taken the initiative.
